[b][color=white]New Hackuman - Vote Inside[/color][/b]
With the help of [b][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=502172][color=white]Novica[/color][/url][/b], [b][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/url][/b] is going to add a new Hackuman and is looking for feedback on the HUM graphic to use. Take a look and submit your thoughts![i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6174406] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Xerotic Role Change[/color][/b]
[b][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=#EC7E03]Xerotic[/color][/url][/b] is stepping down as a full-time developer for Hack Forums. Due to changes in his personal life and career, Xerotic will only be developing for Hack Forums to resolve bugs and issues. The search for a new developer is on the agenda so until then, all new projects are on hold. Thank you Xerotic for your hard work on developing all the new features and improvements. Gave Hack Forums an uplift with your help![i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6172105] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]HackForums.net Launched! - Throwback Thread[/color][/b]
Damn, the OGs will remember this one![i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=28] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

posts.message:
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium][color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/fj0hMCC.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=#ffffff]Fate/kaleid liner Prisma Illya Anime Gets Sequel Work[/color][/b]
Fate/kaleid liner Prisma Illya anime is getting a sequel! This was announced at the event for the anime's new film Fate/kaleid liner Prisma Illya - Licht Nameless Girl (Gekijōban Fate/kaleid liner Prisma Illya Licht - Namae no Nai Shōjo) on Sunday. The theme song of the new film "Just the truth" is performed by Minami Kuribayashi. Sentai Filmworks has licensed the film, and plans to release it on home video and on select digital outlets. The company describes the film:
[i]"Originally developed as an alternate universe to mega hit series Fate/stay night, Fate/kaleid liner Prisma Illya now stands on its own as a bona fide hit and fan-favorite franchise. In the latest feature film installment, its most beloved characters face completely unexpected situations! The Ainsworth family aims to save the world, but the price is sacrifice of magical girl Miyu — but Miyu's brother, Shirou, won't let them have her without a fight. Now it's up to Illya to step in and find a solution that will save not only Miyu, but the entire world."[/i] [url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-08-29/fate-kaleid-liner-prisma-illya-anime-gets-sequel-work/.176770][size=x-small][color=#ffffff]>>Source[/color][/size][/url]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/WAwfn3b.jpg[/img][/align]


[b][color=#ffffff]3rd Yuki Yuna Is a Hero TV Anime Posts New Video, Song Info, October 1 Debut[/color][/b]
It's official that the new anime Yūki Yūna wa Yūsha de Aru Dai-Mankai no Shō (Yuki Yuna Is a Hero: The Great Full Blossom Arc), part of the Yuki Yuna Is a Hero anime franchise will premiere on October 1 on MBS, TBS, and their affiliates. This was announced in the new video released by the official website. The video also includes previews of the upcoming battle scenes and scenes of daily life. [url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-08-27/3rd-yuki-yuna-is-a-hero-tv-anime-posts-new-video-song-info-october-1-debut/.176729][size=x-small][color=#ffffff]>>Source[/color][/size][/url]

[align=center][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A5HBW28mt9I][img]https://i.imgur.com/h7v5xwA.png[/img][/url][/align]


[b][color=#ffffff]1st Free! The Final Stroke Film's Full Trailer Streamed[/color][/b]
After a long wait and a few teasers it's finally here! The trailer for the two-part anime film of the anime Free! named Free! The Final Stroke was released on Thursday by the anime's official website. The trailer was delayed by one week due to the group OLDCODEX's hiatus, and the September 15 release of the first film's theme song was also put on hold. [url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-08-26/1st-free-the-final-stroke-film-full-trailer-streamed/.176684][size=x-small][color=#ffffff]>>Source[/color][/size][/url]

[align=center][video=youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J5xtbQi6c_0[/video][/align]
